Instruction: Wash and cut the potatoes into bite-sized pieces.
Mince the garlic cloves and chop the fresh rosemary.
In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and chopped rosemary until evenly coated.
Spread the potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through, until golden and crispy.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a flavorful side dish.
